product_name: Big Agnes Oak Street Insulated Air Pad - Long - Special Buy
long_description: Don't forget to set an alarm before dozing off on this cozy pad. The long-length Big Agnes Oak Street Insulated Air Sleeping Pad is so comfy you'll wonder how you ever got a wink of sleep without it.
